entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing drizzle changing to rain or periods of drizzle near noon. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
